phrases: The culture festival is finally drawing near...
I think he is around here somewhere, so I will take a look.
Are you sure that is really all right?
One thing I am especially good at...
Because he is the one I love.
Usotsuki na anata nakimushi no atashi
Oshare shita kami mo rain suton no tsume mo
Anata wa kidzuki mo shinai ne
Love kanashii namida nanka ja nai yo
Me ga kawaite hirihiri suru dake
Kimi dake wo atashi dake wo
Kawaikunai nakigao mo se mo aishiteru
Why cannot things go well between
the liar, you, and the crybaby, me?
You do not notice my styled hair
or my nice set of press-on nails.
Love is not about the unhappy tears that go along with it.
Those tears only leave my eyes dry and hurt me.
between only you and only me.
I want to accept your hot feelings
and be taken by you forever.
Despite your uncute, tearful face and your shortness, I still love you.
He is the one I love.
Do you have your lines down pat?
Is it just my imagination, or has he seemed distant lately?
He is been like this ever since the day we had those steamed meat buns...
Like a steamed meat bun or a roasted sweet potato.
Something that warms you up on a cold day.
Well, it can be anything, like a book you like or a CD.
Let us go get some steamed meat buns.
Who did you force into buying that for you?
Buying a ring for yourself... is pretty sad, is not it?
What are we going to do about this?
That will have to be completely redrawn.
After it was looking so good, too...
We are out of time now.
What are we going to do?
We are going to have to buy new paper.
I am free right now, and it is just some painting, right?
Yamamoto-san, could you get a brush for Yano?
You are always slacking off, and you only pretend to be helpful at times like these.
You are pretty good at that, are not you?
After all, since he is the lead in the play, he must be having the toughest time.
It is true that he is skipped a lot of rehearsals, but he also memorizes his lines quickly...
Takahashi-san, you are too easy on Yano.
This is kind of weird, do not you think?
Whenever anyone says anything to Yano...
But when Yamamoto-san said that stuff to him, he did not respond at all.
Do you think it could be because of that?
But last year, she died in a car accident.
That is what I do not get!
She is just the little sister!
It is not like it was Yano's fault her older sister died.
He should be the one blaming other people!
Not only did she betray him, but then she went and died!
Really, Yano should be the one holding a grudge, not Yamamoto-san!
I wonder if I am really that soft with Yano...
Do not you act the same as anyone else?
Yamamoto-san's the one who is a little weird.
And she resents him for turning her down.
She does not seem that simple.
I am not a big fan of her myself, but I do think she is a pretty reasonable person.
That is why I think Yano always restrains himself around Yamamoto-san.
It is like he has some hidden reason he feels guilty about.
You seemed like you could not really respond to Yamamoto-san, so I...
Ah, I really did not care.
Let us stop by the plaza on the way.
There is a long-sleeved T-shirt I really want to get.
How many T-shirts do you need before you are satisfied?
Well, excuse me for buying so many.
You do not have to be so protective of me like before.
But I really thought you were doing your best...
And I am telling you, you do not need to say that sort of stuff.
I am sorry I stuck my nose into your business.
Why are you so mean to her?
I do not think I am...
Then, why do not you try being kinder?
Whenever she is around I cannot concentrate.
Did you say something just now?
Recommended by the Ministry of Education?
My name is Kohsaka, and I am in charge of producing this class's short play.
This story is a masterpiece that will make anyone and everyone cry.
And with the culture festival right before our eyes, the rehearsals should be coming to a close.
After all, the real thing's happening the day after tomorrow.
Do not you think we have had enough rehearsals?
Let us hurry and get the real thing over with!
It is actually nothing like that right now!
Yano-kun, you skipped too many rehearsals.
This is not a laughing matter.
Will Yano really be all right?
It does not look like he has a drop of motivation in him.
Did not someone say he always gets things done when they need to get done?
We have no choice but to put our faith in that, huh, Nana?
I will not say anything unnecessary.
Starting from the scene on page 25!
Drawing your sword on someone holding a mere hoe...
I can see how the mighty warriors have fallen.
I cannot say anything untoward, but drop your weapon, and do as I say.
Otherwise, I cannot guarantee your life.
I do not really want to ask, but do not you have your lines memorized?
Well, there are so many long scenes.
The real thing's the day after tomorrow!
Get someone to hold up cue cards during the real thing.
He does not take care of things when they need to get done at all...
Will we really be all right in time for the actual show?
You are the class president, right?
B-But that and this do not really have much to do with each other.
And I am busy enough with my own role...
It is the day after tomorrow!
By the day after tomorrow, cram as many lines as you can into your head!
I will be sure to have it perfect.
Ah... my stomach's starting to hurt.
Hey, how do you read this?
You are still only at that low level?
You do not have to be so protective of me like before.
Let us go get some steamed meat buns.
I wonder if we will not...
Today, I heard a strange tale from a monk travelling the countryside.
He spoke of a golden lichen growing upon the peak of Mount Kyokurin...
And because of this, people have called that peak upon Mount Kyokurin the Peak of Hope.
Yano can really be amazing at times...
I want to tell Yano that he is amazing...
I should be memorizing my lines right now!
I have to get all three down!
I see you are still as easy as ever...
I hope this goes off well, Nana.
She is still reading the script...
Ah, he is changing right now.
He is always doing things last minute...
I am not sure whether to call it airheadedness or what...
Even though I am just Village Girl 2 and I only have three lines...
Why are there so many people here?
They are all here to see you!
Now, Yano-kun, we are counting on you today.
What was my first line again...?
I might have forgotten all my lines.
Just picture yourself doing it correctly!
He does not have to read it!
Umm... there is something on that mountain over there.
Er, what was it called again?
It is supposed to have this so-called...
It is the Peak of Hope!
Even though all of his lines are random...
He has such a way with words...
And that complete lack of stage fright...
He is strong in these serious events.
It is such a pain, though...
You do not have to be so protective of me like before.
I do not know which is the real Yano...
If I were as out of hand as you, I would fall over!
Or could it be that they are all the real him?
It was a huge success, huh?
But anyway, this is really heavy!
So this is how it ends, huh?
The top of my ring came off!
Ah, the one you bought for yourself?
Nana, just give up on it.
It will be impossible to find.
A person should not go around telling people to die all the time.
If I were to actually die tomorrow in a car accident or something...
As if something convenient like that would-
So I do not say things like that!
I am different from the savage Takahashi!
In the first place, saying die is so boringly simple.
Then how about, I will kill you, bitch?
Before I knew it, we were speaking normally...
Do not you think dying's such an easy way out?
First, I would break a person's fingers one by one...
You do not have to keep going...
Let us just agree that you are a sadist.
That is not what I meant, anyway.
It is just that when you die, you do not feel anything or know what happened.
It always feels like I am about to understand him, but then he gets away...
I hear that during things like this, couples step forward and dance cheek-to-cheek!
I wonder if someone is confessing to Yano right now...
Could you imagine if someone confessed to you?
I will give you something nice.
Let me fix it for you.
Even if the ring's weird, I still feel kind of bad for it.
You have put on weight, have not you?
It does not go on my thumb!
It is like we are exchanging wedding rings...
The words they say at weddings sure are nice, huh?
Do you take this woman to be your wife, and vow to love her forever?
Are we getting married out here?
B-But words are not good enough!
If I were in that situation, I would probably say something like this...
I will only say this once, so listen carefully.
Far in the distance, I heard the sound of fireworks...
Jama da te wo futta ushirosugata anna ni mou
Yuugure no hitonami ni yurenagara chiisaku naru
Anata ga kureta kotoba wo hitotsuzutsu
Omoidashi me wo tojita Shiawasena omoi dake
koko ni aru hazu nano ni Fuan ni naru
doushite nano kokoro ga furueteru no
Tsutaetai motto sou afureteru kono kimochi
Suki dakara suki dakara zettai suki dakara
Yuugure no sabishisa ga sonna yuuki nomikonda
Anata no egao no naka ni watashi ha iru
I waved my hand, but your back is
already swerving through the crowd of people and sinking into the evening sun.
I closed my eyes and began to remember
are supposed to be there, but I become anxious.
Why does my heart waver so?
I want to tell you about my overflowing feelings...
I love you, I love you, I love you more than anything.
I want to turn around, run after you, catch up with you, but
the sadness of the twilit sky swallowed my courage.
Even a short time after we have parted
I want to cry out like a
If only I could be honest with myself,
I would not have had to go through this.
As if it were a miracle...
Yano cast a spell on me.
Is there anything you want for Christmas?
I have decided on what I want for a Christmas present.
